channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Domestic tourism to Singapore's east coast to be promoted: DPM Heng
item.description:
August 16, 2020 12:58 AM

SINGAPORE - Drawing local visitors to the "many hidden gems" on Singapore's east coast is something that grassroots organisations in East Coast GRC are looking to do, by working with government agencies to showcase them, said Deputy Prime Minister Heng Swee Keat on Saturday (Aug 15).

item.title: Jewel Music Box KTV at HomeTeamNS Khatib among places visited by Covid-19 cases
item.description:
August 16, 2020 12:48 AM
